name: Waste Savior VR
description:
The Story

The commander from the planet 'AbsolutePlanet' notices the dangers of global warming. that is going to happen in the human world with An evil organization called DarkPallette. behind the scenes, because they do not want the world to maintain the environment and the proper disposal of waste The commander then sends 'SaviorMan' (NPC) to save the world from this crisis. When 'SaviorMan' comes down to earth, meets a human player (player) who loves nature. And ready to save the world, 'SaviorMan' has given players magic gloves along with the power to pick up trash. and assign a mission to save the world with SaviorMan

For HTC vive & Oculus Virtual Reality (VR)
